name: Hellish Helper
description:
The game reflects the ungrateful attitude of some people towards others. Surely in the life of each of us there was a person whose requests are simply impossible to satisfy-they will always be dissatisfied. In this game you will not be able to win and please the character: he will always find something to complain about.

PS Please play the game correctly so as not to break the narrative, the game is released in a simplified version :)

Resolution: 1920x1080
